title: Explicit expressions for Virasoro singular vectors
abstract:
We present two explicit expressions for generic singular vectors of type
$(r,s)$ of the Virasoro algebra. These results follow from the paper of Bauer
et al which presented recursive methods to construct the vectors. The
expressions presented here generalise the results of Benoit-Saint Aubin for the
type $(1,s)$ singular vectors in two different ways: the first simply solves
the recursion through the use of partitions; the second gives explicit formulae
for the coefficients in a particular expansion. A Mathematica notebook is
available which implements the formulae.
